Package org.blockchainnative.annotations

Annotation Type EventParameter

  • @Retention(RUNTIME)
@Target(PARAMETER)
public @interface EventParameter
    By definition all parameters/arguments of event methods (i.e. methods annotated with ContractEvent) are considered to be event parameters. These parameters are used by the underlying provider to create the Observable containing the events.

    EventParameter allows specifying the name of event parameters such that the underlying blockchain provider can identify them.
    How the argument is handled is up to the provider.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element Description
      java.lang.String value
      Specifies the name of the event parameter.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        java.lang.String value
        Specifies the name of the event parameter.
        Name and type of the parameter need to match with one of the parameters supported by the underlying provider.
        Returns:
        name of the event parameter
